page.title: 08A SPORTING SURVEY
page.content:
According to a National Survey on Sport, more than half the people in Britain participate in one sport or another. This local survey on sport in OUR area, will determine which are the most popular and unpopular sports currently around. The most popular sports are listed below in order of popularity:- football tennis cricket athletics and hockey swimming others
Out of a group of thirty people questioned between the ages of 12 and 13, eighteen were boys, so it is unsurprising that football came top of the list. However, what may be surprising is that several{girls}put
